import React, { useState } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import arrowIcon from '../../../imgs/icons/arrow.png'; import updateIcon from '../../../imgs/icons/updateIcon.png'; import deleteIcon from '../../../imgs/icons/deleteIcon.png'; import { moveItemUpOrDown, toggleIncludedInInvoice, } from '../utils/displayTableFun'; export default function TasksDisplayTable({ tasks, updateState }) { const [tableState, setTableState] = useState(tasks); console.log(tableState); return ( {tableState.length === 0 && ( )} {tableState.length > 0 && tableState.map((item, index) => ( ))}
Current tasks list.

Use arrows to move items up and down the list. By default all items will be included in a new invoice form and remove from the list once the invoice is created.

Task description Item Quantity Rate Amount Add task to a new invoice Move Item Up Move Item Down Update Task Delete Task
You have currently none tasks saved.
{item.description}: {item.qty} {item.rate} {item.amount} {index !== 0 && ( )} {/* last td of last tr disabled with css */}
); } TasksDisplayTable.propTypes = { tasks: PropTypes.array, };
